sentences: Ta kasutas palju jõudu selle koha üles ehitamisel.
Lapsuajal õppis ta jõudu tegema ja sai heaks akroaadiks.
Väikeste laste seas on populaarsed erinevad jõunu harjutused.
context: The word 'jõudu' is the partitive form of 'jõud' (strength) and in this context refers to strength exercises or gymnastic/acrobatic training activities. It's commonly used when referring to various physical strengthening exercises, particularly in sports and acrobatics contexts.
